author: tangenius
content: Hi guys I have been wondering what the purpose of `libp2p_dns` is. I know what DNS is but from what I saw in libp2p it uses ip addresses to communicate with peers. Is that for if you want to support servers behind a reverse proxy or something? Here are the docs which provide me not much clarification: https://docs.rs/libp2p-dns/latest/libp2p_dns/
